name: FPV MultiRotor
description:
FPV Multirotor Race Simulator

Works smoothly in standard PC, don't need a PC Gamer

For better experience it is highly recommended to use a USB controller.

See videos at :

Actual :

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIg-sbKBPd5ZrbvCe...

Beta :

Most USB controllers should work*

* Controllers that have been used successfully include Realflight and Esky USB controllers, Xbox, PS3 and Logitech gamepads, FrSky Taranis, Spektrum, Flysky, Walkera, Graupner and Futaba RC radios. Please try the free demo version to see if it will work with your controller
